name: Escape Z
description:
Welcome to Escape Z, the thrilling multiplayer survival game where you and your friends must join forces to face off against ever-growing hordes of flesh-hungry zombies. Get ready for an intense, adrenaline-fuelled challenge as you try to survive as long as possible in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the zombie plague.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀    

Key Features:



Tactical Cooperation : Collaborate with other players in matches of up to 4 people. Plan tactics to survive waves of increasingly vicious zombies.

Different Character : Choose up to 8 characters with different initial weapons .

Dynamic Maps : Explore several detailed maps, each with unique locations. From desolate ruined city streets to haunted forests, each map will require different strategies to survive.

Special Enemies: Face special enemies. Prepare to think quickly and strategically to defeat these unique threats.

Get ready for an explosive and fast-paced multiplayer gaming experience in Escape Z. Assemble your team, hone your skills and prepare to fight for survival in a zombie-infested world.
